--- title: FastSHAP keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This project brings in part of the `SHAP` library into `fastai2` and make it compatable. Currently just supports the `tabular` module for the following plots:" ---

Install¶

pip install fastshap

How to use¶

exp = KernelExplainer(learn, df.iloc[:100])

exp.dependance_plot('age')

exp.decision_plot()
